burlap.behavior.valuefunction

Class QValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.valuefunction.QValue

  • public class QValue
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store Q-values.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Action a
      The action with which this Q-value is associated
      double q
      The numeric Q-value
      State s
      The state with which this Q-value is associated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QValue()
      Default constructor for serialization purposes.
      QValue(QValue src)
      Initialializes this Q-value by copying the information from another Q-value.
      QValue(State s, Action a, double q)
      Creates a Q-value for the given state an action pair with the specified q-value

              Action a,

        Creates a Q-value for the given state an action pair with the specified q-value

        s - the state
        a - the action
        q - the initial Q-value

        public QValue(QValue src)
        Initialializes this Q-value by copying the information from another Q-value.
